trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"></xref> element of an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u de <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures"> </xref> of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"> </xref> element van een <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: Deze klasse bevat geen openbare constructor.

trans-unit.source: References to an XpsStructure are obtained through the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IDocumentStructureProvider.AddDocumentStructure%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IStoryFragmentProvider.AddStoryFragment%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Verwijzingen naar een XpsStructure worden verkregen via de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IDocumentStructureProvider.AddDocumentStructure%2A>of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IStoryFragmentProvider.AddStoryFragment%2A>methoden.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IStoryFragmentProvider.AddStoryFragment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IDocumentStructureProvider.AddDocumentStructure%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> elements of an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>, see Chapter 9 in the *XPS Paper Specification (XPS)* which you can download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Voor meer informatie over de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures>of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments>elementen van een <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>, raadpleegt u hoofdstuk 9 in de *XPS XPS (Paper Specification)* die u kunt downloaden op [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures>
